shadows

Class ShadowMapMasterRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • shadows.ShadowMapMasterRenderer

  • public class ShadowMapMasterRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is in charge of using all of the classes in the shadows package to carry out the shadow render pass, i.e. rendering the scene to the shadow map texture. This is the only class in the shadows package which needs to be referenced from outside the shadows package.
    Author:
    Karl

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ShadowMapMasterRenderer(Camera camera)
      Creates instances of the important objects needed for rendering the scene to the shadow map.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ShadowMapMasterRenderer

        public ShadowMapMasterRenderer(Camera camera)
        Creates instances of the important objects needed for rendering the scene to the shadow map. This includes the ShadowBox which calculates the position and size of the "view cuboid", the simple renderer and shader program that are used to render objects to the shadow map, and the ShadowFrameBuffer to which the scene is rendered. The size of the shadow map is determined here.
        Parameters:
        camera - - the camera being used in the scene.

    • Method Detail

      • render

        public void render(java.util.Map<TexturedModel,java.util.List<Entity>> entities,
                   java.util.Collection<Terrain> terrains,
                   java.util.Map<TexturedModel,java.util.List<Entity>> normalMapEntities,
                   Light sun,
                   Camera camera)
        Carries out the shadow render pass. This renders the entities to the shadow map. First the shadow box is updated to calculate the size and position of the "view cuboid". The light direction is assumed to be "-lightPosition" which will be fairly accurate assuming that the light is very far from the scene. It then prepares to render, renders the entities to the shadow map, and finishes rendering.
        Parameters:
        entities - - the lists of entities to be rendered. Each list is associated with the TexturedModel that all of the entities in that list use.
        sun - - the light acting as the sun in the scene.

      • getToShadowMapSpaceMatrix

        public org.lwjgl.util.vector.Matrix4f getToShadowMapSpaceMatrix()
        This biased projection-view matrix is used to convert fragments into "shadow map space" when rendering the main render pass. It converts a world space position into a 2D coordinate on the shadow map. This is needed for the second part of shadow mapping.
        Returns:
        The to-shadow-map-space matrix.

      • cleanUp

        public void cleanUp()
        Clean up the shader and FBO on closing.

      • getShadowMap

        public int getShadowMap()
        Returns:
        The ID of the shadow map texture. The ID will always stay the same, even when the contents of the shadow map texture change each frame.

      • getLightSpaceTransform

        protected org.lwjgl.util.vector.Matrix4f getLightSpaceTransform()
        Returns:
        The light's "view" matrix.
